name: Garlic-Herb Butter Drop Biscuits
author: slyorkie
summary: Excellent drop biscuits made with lots of real butter, garlic, and herbs!
ingredients: ½ cup chilled unsalted butter, cut into cubes
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Sift flour, baking powder, white sugar, cream of tartar, 1/3 teaspoon garlic powder, and salt together in a large bowl
Mash unsalted butter cubes into the flour mixture with a pastry cutter or large fork until coarsely blended
Mix Cheddar cheese and Italian seasoning into the flour mixture
Pour milk over the flour mixture while stirring until you get a tough and sticky dough
Drop dough by the tablespoon onto the prepared baking sheet
Bake in preheated oven until lightly browned, about 15 minutes
Stir melted salted butter, parsley flakes, and 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder together in a bowl; brush over biscuits immediately upon removing from the oven
